name: Elizabeth
text: I can't believe I just watched AI turn a boring text prompt into a complete UI design and flow right before my eyes in seconds with  Zordie AI.

name: Andre
text:
One of the coolest products I’ve used lately is called Zordie AI. It uses AI to automatically design and create mobile apps, web products, and basically any product experience you can imagine with just a simple English prompt.

No code.

 No design.

 No effort.

It took me 60 seconds to create two products out of nowhere.

name: Nolan Perkins
text:
Zordie AI just dropped a Figma plugin and I think it’s going to change my UI & UX design process!

Zordie AI is going to help bridge the gap from idea to visualization, which will help designers move faster, and product managers communicate better to their designers fostering better collaboration in the product team.

name: Joelle
text: Zordie AI isn’t your average AI tool that overpromises and under delivers - it has actually useful features that are designed to speed up your design process.

name: Kyle
text: One of my favourite design platforms is called Zordie AI. Autodesigner is only 1 of 9 AI tools on the platform. And the AI tools are only a small sliver of what Uizard can do.

name: Janus Tiu
text: Tried out this AI-powered UI design assistant tool today. It has a couple of amazing features, including turning screenshots to wireframes, converting sketches into mock-ups, and my favourite - an AI text writer!

name: Carl
text:
I'm so freaking impressed with Zordie AI.

Design tool + AI = Magic

🔸 Instantly generate designs from a prompt or screenshot
🔸 Get a predictive heat map of where users will focus
🔸 Powerful design tool on its own

name: David
text: Great tools like Zordie AI are available to empower PMs to boost learning. From zero to a clickable prototype in 30 seconds, that’s unbelievable.

name: Ari
text: You can now QUICKLY add new design features to your existing designs 🎉😲 I’moften working closely with senior stakeholders, and they find it challenging to visualise specific ideas I am proposing 😕 I usually try to mock up a wireframe quickly, but it isn’t as impactful as I would like. I also don’t have time to mock up anything higher fidelity as there just isn’t time ⏳😐🚀 Uizard’s Autodesigner 1.5 has completely changed my process 🚀
